New Records: Morocco scored a late goal in extra time, breaking the deadlock and securing a 1-0 victory over Lesotho in their Africa Cup of Nations Qualification match on 2024-09-09 at Stade d'Agadir.
Key Match Events: Lesotho scored their sole goal in the 90th minute plus three minutes, converting a chance in extra time with Brahim DÃ­az netting the decisive goal, assisted by Youssef En-Nesyri.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Stade d'Agadir, with Morocco dominating possession at 78.2% compared to Lesotho's 21.8%. Morocco also had a significant 15 shots compared to Lesotho's 2, with 5 shots on target.
Others: The match was part of Group B in the Africa Cup of Nations Qualification.
